summary: An email from an FBI agent in New York to another FBI agent, discussing Epstein discovery and noting that a person named Bruce assisted at least one victim and was not responding to communication.

persons.name: Bruce
persons.role: Individual who assisted at least one victim
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who assisted at least one victim and was not responding to communication from the email sender and another person.

keyFacts: The email discusses Epstein discovery material.
It mentions an individual named Bruce who assisted at least one victim.
Bruce was not responding to communication from the sender and another person.
The email was sent on Yom Kippur in 2021, indicating ongoing case activity at that time.
